description.raw:
~~~
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -s 1107 -t

Remove redundant call of WorldPlugin::Init from gazebo_2.2 branch (#1208)
 1107    2014-06-10    044dad628344    3805ed1e973a    issue_1208_2.2
~~~

~~~
$ tools/bitbucket_pullrequests --list --title

Extruded Polyline Model Inclusion
 1026    2014-03-21    8a04d59cd7e7    6713bad3105d    gazebo_issue1046

Add road textures
 1027    2014-03-21    48e142a85c87    6713bad3105d    gazebo_issue1045

issue #1144 fix inertia ratio reduction error with hardcoded ratio limit. check for violation of line criterion. added test.
 1052    2014-04-03    1d36a9ee728b    d3677acdec5b    ode_physics_params_irr_debug_1.9

Open Street Maps Plugin for Gazebo Simulator
 1060    2014-04-09    36e56fce49a8    6713bad3105d    gazebo_osm

fix issue #1138, SetJointPosition
 1096    2014-05-21    1024b4057399    f27ed5d03ca3    set_joint_position

fix issue #1138 for default (gazebo 4.0 candidate)
 1097    2014-05-21    2cc6c501c590    6713bad3105d    set_joint_position_gazebo_4.0

Added World::RemoveModel to fix issue #1177
 1106    2014-06-07    a85d011ebd5f    0c1dd36ccb70    issue_1177

Remove redundant call of WorldPlugin::Init from gazebo_2.2 branch (#1208)
 1107    2014-06-10    044dad628344    3805ed1e973a    issue_1208_2.2
~~~

title.raw: Add option to display pull request title to bitbucket_pullrequests tool
